value.title: Mike Pence and the GOP Mount a Last Stand in Arizona
value.excerpt: Most voters have made up their minds, so the Trump campaign is rallying the conservative ‘old guard.’

value.title: Fans want Jeff Goldblum to play ‘the fly’ on Mike Pence’s head on ‘SNL’
value.excerpt: Senator Kamala Harris and Vice President Mike Pence’s vice presidential debate was broken up into nine segments with topics ranging from the Covid-19 pandemic to climate change to the economy. Though,

value.title: Halloween store selling 'Debate Fly Wig' inspired by bug on Mike Pence's head at VP debate
value.excerpt: Just in time for Halloween, an online shop is selling a bug-bedecked white wig inspired by the now-viral fly that landed in Vice President Mike Pence’s hair during the vice presidential debate on Wednesday night.

value.title: LIVE updates: Arizona in the spotlight as Mike Pence, Joe Biden and Kamala Harris visit Thursday
value.excerpt: Vice President Mike Pence is having a rally in Peoria while former Vice President Joe Biden and Kamala Harris meet with Phoenix business owners.

value.title: What Makes Mike Pence’s Complicity So Chilling
value.excerpt: Somewhere under the cornfields and backyard hoop courts of Indiana is a small black box holding the conscience of Vice President Mike Pence. He buried it four years ago, when a tape emerged of Donald Trump boasting about sexually assaulting women.

value.title: Vice President Mike Pence postpones Friday appearance to vote in Indianapolis
value.excerpt: Vice President Mike Pence cancels a Friday appearance in Indianapolis to vote early. His office says the trip to cast his ballot will be rescheduled.

value.title: Karen Pence’s office says both sides agreed to no masks at end of debate
Mike Pence avoided Roe v. Wade in Wednesday’s debate. Here’s why.
value.excerpt: Both parties are out of touch on abortion. But most voters support Roe, and conservatives already trust Pence on social issues.

value.title: Karen Pence's office defends her appearing without a mask at debate
value.excerpt: Second lady Karen Pence’s office defended her appearance on the debate stage Wednesday night without wearing a mask.

value.title: Pence does his best but Harris won't let him explain away Trump's failures
value.excerpt: Vice President Mike Pence tried his best on Wednesday to recast the reality of Donald Trump's presidency, but Sen. Kamala Harris, the Democratic pick for his job, refused to let him spin away the nation's current dire plight during their single debate.

value.title: Vice presidential debate: Both Trump, Biden campaign claim victory after Pence, Harris showdown
value.excerpt: Both the Trump campaign and the Biden campaign claimed victory after Wednesday night’s vice presidential debate—with team Trump touting Vice President Pence, saying he is “ready to lead,” and team Biden praising Sen. Kamala Harris for making a “forceful case” for a Biden presidency.

value.title: Former CIA Director Accuses Mike Pence of Lying About Hillary Clinton and Russia During VP Debate
value.excerpt: Vice President Mike Pence "lied about handwritten notes of mine from 2016 that referenced unsubstantiated Russian allegation about Secretary Clinton" during his debate with Senator Kamala Harris, former CIA Director John Brennan tweeted on Wednesday night.

value.title: Analysis: This is Vice President Mike Pence's answer on a peaceful transfer of power. Read it carefully.
value.excerpt: The vice presidential debate Wednesday night will be remembered more for how the candidates evaded questions than how they answered them.

value.title: AOC to VP Pence: ‘It’s Congresswoman Ocasio-Cortez to you’
value.excerpt: U.S. Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez appeared to be closely watching the vice presidential debate Wednesday night, tweeting several responses to comments by Vice President Mike Pence.

value.title: AOC Corrects Mike Pence During VP Debate: 'It's Congresswoman Ocasio-Cortez to You'
value.excerpt: Cortez tweeted to Vice President Mike Pence as he referred to her as "AOC" during his debate with Senator Kamala Harris. "It's Congresswoman Ocasio-Cortez to you."

value.title: Pence targets Biden over ISIS hostages, brings family of executed aid worker to debate
value.excerpt: Vice President Pence invoked slain ISIS hostage Kayla Mueller on Wednesday as he sought to tout what he described as President Trump’s foreign policy accomplishments in his debate against Sen. Kamala Harris (D-Calif.

value.title: A Fly Landed on Mike Pence
value.excerpt: A local TV news reporter from California clocked the fly’s screen time on Mr. Pence’s head at 2 minutes, 3 seconds. While Mr. Pence spent most of the 90-minute debate avoiding direct questions posed by the moderator,

value.title: Pence attacks Biden for failing to rescue Kayla Mueller, who was held hostage by ISIS.
value.excerpt: Vice President Mike Pence brought the parents of Kayla Mueller, the human rights activist who was killed in 2015 by members of the Islamic State in Syria, to the debate hall and attacked Joseph R. Biden Jr.

value.title: An unexpected guest: Fly lands on Mike Pence's head during debate, goes viral
value.excerpt: The fly, which was on Mike Pence's head for several minutes, quickly went viral and created a buzz – pun intended – online.

value.title: Ed Rollins: VP debate –Harris, Pence faceoff in Utah and America should look to hear this one word
value.excerpt: It is not unrealistic to think that Pence or Harris could be America’s president in the not-too-distant future

value.title: Mike Pence reluctantly agrees to plexiglass barriers in tonight’s V.P. debate.
value.excerpt: From "The Daily 202" podcast: the Commission on Presidential Debates said the vice president dropped his objections to a plexiglass barricade on his side of the stage for today’s debate after viewing the setup during a walk-through of the debate hall.

value.title: Mike Pence: What you need to know about the Republican nominee for vice president
value.excerpt: Everything you need to know about Vice President Mike Pence, Donald Trump's vice president on the Republican ticket.

value.title: Mike Pence Gets A Rare Moment In The National Spotlight
value.excerpt: Vice President Mike Pence takes the stage for a debate with Kamala Harris in Salt Lake City Wednesday night. The debate comes amid President Trump's treatment for COVID-19. Pence has tested negative.

value.title: Mike Pence Brought Conservatives Home. What If They Don’t Need Him Anymore?
value.excerpt: Evangelical Christians were drawn to the vice president because he shared their values. But Trump’s style has made defiance of political norms, not a Pence specialty, seem appealing.

value.title: Pence preps for debate as chances to shake up the race dwindle
value.excerpt: Vice President Mike Pence is set to square off with Sen. Kamala Harris at the vice presidential debate Wednesday in Salt Lake City just over one exceptionally long week since President Donald Trump faced former Vice President Joe Biden on the debate stage.

value.title: Tim Kaine on What It’s Like to Debate Mike Pence
value.excerpt: Mr. Kaine, Hillary Clinton’s running mate in 2016, spoke to The Times about what lies ahead for Senator Kamala Harris at Wednesday’s V.P. debate.

value.title: Pence to vote in Indiana this week as state's early voting begins
value.excerpt: Vice President Mike Pence and second lady Karen Pence are expected to fly to Indiana Friday, to vote in person from the second family’s home state, as early voting kicked off Tuesday.

value.title: Pence faces tall task in VP debate
value.excerpt: Vice President Mike Pence faces a challenging environment in the first vice presidential debate on Wednesday, which will take place against an unprecedented backdrop of events.

value.title: Don’t Underestimate Mike Pence
value.excerpt: A soothing dose of Hoosier calm might be just what the Trump campaign needed.

value.title: WSJ Opinion: The Trump Ticket Needs a Dose of Mike Pence
value.excerpt: Main Street: Wednesday night's prime-time face-off between Mike Pence and Kamala Harris could be the most consequential vice-presidential debate ever. Images: A
